sources.title: Air Devils
sources.description: Two daredevil pilots go after the same girl.

sources.title: Air Devils (1938) ACTION ADVENTURE
sources.description:
Stars: Larry J. Blake, Dick Purcell, Beryl Wallace
 Director: John Rawlins

 Two daredevil pilots go after the same girl at a military outpost in the South Seas!

sources.title: Air Devils (1938) Action, Adventure, Romance Full Length Movie
sources.description:
She Was The Island Girl Of Their Dreams... But they couldn't sleep worrying about her!
Two daredevil pilots go after the same girl.
 
Director: John Rawlins
Writers: Harold Buckley (original story "The Fighting Marines")
Stars: Larry J. Blake, Dick Purcell, Beryl Wallace 
Genres: Classics, Action, Adventure, Romance

@CCC socials:
FB : https://www.facebook.com/CultCinemaClassics 
IG : https://www.instagram.com/cultcinemaclassics
TW: https://www.twitch.tv/cultcinema

metadata.Plot: Two bickering ex-marine pilots, "Horseshoe" Donovan (Larry Blake) and "Slats" Harrrington, looking for further adventures, following their discharge from the Marine Corps. sign on as flying policeman for the dictator of a banana-republic south sea island during a rebellion against El Presidento (Michael Visaroff) and his hirelings. Between fighting over the same girl, Marcia Bradford, who may not be what she appears to be, they soon realize they are on the wrong side of the conflict.
metadata.Actors: Larry J. Blake, Dick Purcell, Beryl Wallace
